Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO GOVERNMENTAL OPERATIONS
REPORTED REFERRED TO WAYS AND MEANS

Votes.VoteType: Favorable refer to committee Ways and Means

Title: Requires events held by the state or on state property which include alcohol to include alcohol produced within the state
Summary: Requires events held by the state or on state property which include alcohol to include alcohol produced within the state.
LawCode: Add ยง163-e, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, the public buildings law, and the parks, recreation and historic preservation law, in relation to requiring events held by the state or on state property which include alcohol to include alcohol produced within the state
